name: GAMMA
description:
Inspired by the 2015 "AUST" game cartridge http://famicase.com/16/softs/141.html

How to play:
- attack with E (sometimes hiding is the best option)
- jump with space
- fly with F
- you can hide in some places to avoid the red guards' patrol by pressing the up arrow

Development : Gaétan Guerrero

Art : Jennifer Siclari a.k.a Kirin

Graphic elements (characters, NPC, backgrounds and animations) belong to Gaétan Guerrero and Jennifer Siclari.
